messages.message:
<!here> I'm running some preemptive tag pruning operations in ECR to prevent the screeching halt we've seen the last couple weeks on sandbox builds.

Please note that the nature of the pruning operation will cause some pods to become unrunnable, as the tag they specify is gone - you'll need to run an Update in ICC if you run into this issue.

Here is the proposed -- rough architecture deck: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1-y0lz3gKgbYMzoKzrsFgs_nq2cqM3ZzuNeW6EjJaGLs/edit#slide=id.g3264ebdcb75_0_10

Please note this is by no means final and there are many edge cases that need to be considered -- please review this and send me key issues with this one
the goal here is: easy to build & iterate fast, easy to deploy, easy to test, easy to scale, and is designed with future AI agent based execution in mind
this should be designed from scratch -- there is no refactoring of the old code
we'll move the business logic from the old code to this new architecture when this new architecture skeleton is ready and tested for deployment, scale, upgrades, etc. independently
